text: The Kia K4 is a compact car made by Kia since 2024 it replaced the Kia Forte. == History and Features == The Kia K4 was showed at the New York International Auto Show in 21 March 2024. and launched also in the New York International Auto in 27 March of the same year the car have Hatchback and Sedan versions. It has 1.6 and 2.0 liter gasoline engines and a 8-speed automatic CVT transmission and it has features like a Al Assistant voice control technology that is activated by saying "Hey Kia". == Markets == The Kia K4 is currently sold in North America Australia and Middle East the car is not sold in South Korea. == References == K4 (2025) Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Kia K4 (2025)
